TopicTitle: Comprehensive Mod Compatibility List for KSP 1.0

Articles.Content:
**Mod Compatibility in 1.0**

KSP 1.0 has just been released. Most mods have not yet been updated. Many mods will require updates to function correctly or at all. **Unusually, many parts-only mods will require updates** as a result of the [stack attach node changes](%5Brelpath%5D%5B/relpath%5D#%252%24s). Those that do work could use balancing passes for drag (for hollow parts and lifting surfaces), heating, and lift. Rocket engines now draw constant fuel, but thrust varies with Isp, and jet engine performance varies with velocity and atmospheric pressure. Jet engines will function like rockets until updated.

**Quick links:**

[Known compatible with update](%5Brelpath%5D%5B/relpath%5D#%252%24s)

[Known compatible without update](%5Brelpath%5D%5B/relpath%5D#%252%24s)

[Largely Compatible as of listed version](%5Brelpath%5D%5B/relpath%5D#%252%24s)

[Known incompatible](%5Brelpath%5D%5B/relpath%5D#%252%24s)

This thread is for reporting mod compatibilities. Please follow these guidelines when submitting a compatibility report:

1. Include the **mod version** and **forum link**.
2. If you get a popup warning about incompatibility, please respect that. There's no need to post about it here Ã¢â‚¬â€œ the mod author has done this because the mod will likely break in unpredictable ways with new releases of KSP.
3. **Be specific:** say what doesn't work about the mod.
4. **Try the mod alone.** Some mods may cause incompatibilities with the new version of KSP.

Example Reports:

[KW Rocketry 2.6d2](https://forum.kerbalspaceprogram.com/threads/51037) Ã¢â‚¬â€œ can't attach parts to bottom stack attach nodes.

[Hullcam VDS 0.33](https://forum.kerbalspaceprogram.com/threads/46365) Ã¢â‚¬â€œ largely compatible. The cameras and zoom function as expected, but the stack nodes on the telescopes are the wrong direction.

* * *

> Stack nodes are directional and can now only be attached to opposite facing nodes. For example, the [Modular Girder Segment's](http://wiki.kerbalspaceprogram.com/wiki/Modular_Girder_Segment) bottom stack node now has a negative y-component in the direction vector:
> 
> 
> node\_stack\_top = 0.0, 0.5592728, 0.0, 0.0, 1.0, 0.0, 1  
> node\_attach = 0.0, -0.5592728, 0.0, 0.0, -1.0, 0.0
> 
> 
>     node_stack_bottom = 0.0, -0.5592728, 0.0, 0.0, [COLOR=#ff0000][B]-1.0[/B][/COLOR], 0.0, 1
> 
> 
>

Mostly compatible:

[Tantares v23](https://forum.kerbalspaceprogram.com/threads/81537-1-0-Tantares-Stockalike-Soyuz-and-MIR-23-27-04-2015-More-Revamp)

TantaresLV v8

What doesn't work: most of parachutes, some engine ISP curves don't have third key yet, small non-1.0-related bugs.

My contracts mods have all been updated and are working with KSP 1.0 in my testing.

[thread=91034]Contracts Window + version 5.0[/thread] - Working and updated

[thread=113277]Contracts Reward Modifier version 2.0[/thread] - Working and updated

[thread=116002]CapCom version 0.3[/thread] - Working and updated

[thread=64972]DMagic Orbital Science version 1.0.1[/thread] - Not Working. I haven't tested it, but based on API changes it will give errors when collecting science and contracts won't work. The tech tree position of parts is also changed.
[Kerbal Engineer Redux V1.0.16.3](https://forum.kerbalspaceprogram.com/threads/18230-1-0-Kerbal-Engineer-Redux-v1-0-16-3) has been updated for version 1.0.

Incompatible:

[AIES Aerospace](https://forum.kerbalspaceprogram.com/threads/35383-0-23-AIES-Aerospace-v1-5-1) Ã¢â‚¬â€œ Can't attach parts to bottom stack attach nodes.

Mostly compatible:

[NavHud](https://forum.kerbalspaceprogram.com/threads/81543) - Cosmetic issues, and the camera changes create motion sickness.

[Editor Extensions](https://github.com/MachXXV/EditorExtensions) - Icon doesn't appear, but other functionality is present.
